attributes.sig: Take as directed by your healthcare provider
Take as directed by your healthcare provider.

instruction: Keep up with current routine and watch salt intake.

attributes.comment: Keep up with current routine and watch salt intake.

instruction: Patient reports no stomach pain with celecoxib unlike with ibuprofen. Blood pressure has been stable at home, usually around 120/80. Patient tries to stay active with light walking and stretching, but arthritis makes it tough sometimes.

attributes.narrative: Patient reports no stomach pain with celecoxib unlike with ibuprofen. Blood pressure has been stable at home, usually around 120/80. Patient tries to stay active with light walking and stretching, but arthritis makes it tough sometimes.
